src_original: p.129.5/.rājā tu tasyā bhavati^iha bhartā stana^upariṣṭāt pratibimbam āhuḥ//
p.130.1ab/.śīrṣe tu yasyās tilaka^alakaḥ syāt sūkṣmo bhaved añjana^cūrṇa^varṇaḥ/
p.130.1cd/.senāpatis tasyā bhaved dhi bhartā stana^antare +asyāḥ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//
tgt_original: 乳間有報。 夫為將軍。

src_original: p.130.2ab/.bhrūvontare +asyās tilaka^alakaḥ syād duṣcāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
tgt_original: 眉間有黑。 報黶在頸。
